Name: Statuette of Nefertem
Description: Nefertem is represented striding, his left foot advanced. He wears a short royal kilt, a tripartite wig, an artificial pleated beard and a composite crown consisting of a stylized lotus flower and two feathers. The arms are pendant to the body, the fists are clenched. The back side of the base bears two senseless hieroglyphic signs. There are two tenons below the base.
